summary: Davy Crockett and his sidekick Georgie compete against boastful Mike Fink ("King of the River") in a boat race to New Orleans. Later, Davy and Georgie, allied with Fink, battle a group of ... See full summary Â»
cast: Fess Parker|Buddy Ebsen|Jeff York|Kenneth Tobey|Clem Bevans|Irvin Ashkenazy|Mort Mills|Paul Newlan|Frank Richards|Troy Melton|Hank Worden|Walter Catlett|Fred Aldrich|William Bakewell|Tom Coleman|Douglass Dumbrille|George J. Lewis
title: Davy Crockett y los piratas del Mississippi
